pages.about_cookies_i_103: Cookies on the site: how they work and why they are needed. When visiting almost any site, you are likely to encounter a notice about the use of cookies. Cheese Mosaic A Tapestry of Taste Home About Us Our cheese Contact us Cookies on the site: how they work and why they are needed When you visit almost any website, you are likely to encounter a cookie notice. But what are they, how do they work and why are they needed? Let's figure it out. Cookies, or cookies, are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They are designed to record certain information about your preferences, actions and settings in order to facilitate your subsequent interactions with the site. The cookie process begins the moment you first access the site. The website sends a cookie to your device, which is stored in your browser. On subsequent visits to the site, your browser sends this file back to the website server, providing information about your previous interaction with the site. Why do websites need cookies? They perform several important functions. First of all, cookies help improve the user experience. For example, they remember your language preference or provide you with personalized recommendations based on your previous activities on the site. Cookies are also used to improve site security and analytics. They can help a site track the number of visitors, how long they stay on the site, and measure the effectiveness of advertising. With this information, website owners can develop and improve their services and offer more relevant content to visitors. However, it is important to note that some users have concerns regarding security and privacy when using cookies.Although cookies are not capable of collecting personal information, they still leave traces of your activities on the site. To protect yourself, you can take advantage of your browser's options to manage cookies or use tools to block tracking. In conclusion, website cookies play an important role in improving the user experience, security and analytics of websites. They allow websites to offer personalized content as well as collect information about visitors to improve their services. Please be aware that you can always control the use of cookies and ensure your privacy when visiting websites. pages.about_i_103: Cheese Mosaic: Pioneering Artisan Cheese in Mumbai Since 2015 Cheese Mosaic A Tapestry of Taste Home About Us Our cheese Contact us The Story of Cheese Mosaic – Mumbai's Home of Artisan Cheese ➛ Our Legacy: Crafting India's Premier Cheese Experience Welcome to Cheese Mosaic, where our story weaves through the bustling streets of Mumbai to bring you the essence of artisanal cheese. The Visionary Beginnings It all began on a vibrant Mumbai morning in the spring of 2015 when two cheese aficionados, Rajesh Mehta and Anjali Singh, decided to turn their passion into a purpose. With a shared dream and a wealth of experience in the culinary arts, they embarked on a journey to create a cheese haven unlike any other – thus, Cheese Mosaic was born. Opening Doors to Cheese Artistry On the 1st of October, 2015, the doors of Cheese Mosaic opened for the first time in the heart of Mumbai's dynamic culinary scene. The founders' vision was clear: to introduce a boutique cheese experience that would celebrate the diversity and richness of cheese from around the globe, tailored to the Indian palate. Crafting the Mosaic Rajesh, with his extensive travel and taste for global flavors, brought to the table a selection of the world's finest cheeses. Anjali, with her deep understanding of the local cuisine and culture, infused the collection with a selection of Indian artisanal cheeses. Together, they curated a mosaic of cheeses that were not just food, but stories – each slice a page from a diary of flavors. A Legacy of Passion and Excellence Cheese Mosaic is more than just a store; it is a destination that reflects the founders' passion for excellence and quality. Rajesh and Anjali's commitment to sustainability, education, and community has turned Cheese Mosaic into a beloved brand, synonymous with the finest cheese experience in India. Welcome to Cheese Mosaic – where every cheese has a story waiting to be told. Get ready to immerse yourself in the world of Indian cheeses and enjoy their exquisite taste and aroma. Whether you like mild and milky flavors or prefer a more intense and tangy flavor, you are sure to find a cheese to suit your taste in India. Our Promise to You Every visit to Cheese Mosaic is an invitation to explore the world of cheese through our eyes. We promise to take you on a journey filled with delicious discoveries, from the creamy pastures of Europe to the spirited dairies of India. Our mission is to create a cheese narrative that resonates with every cheese lover, novice or expert. Join Our Story As Cheese Mosaic continues to grow, we invite you to become a part of our story – a story that celebrates the art of cheese in every color, texture, and flavor. Together, let's create memories one cheese platter at a time. ➛ back to the beginning Cheese Mosaic Contact Us +9102266333763 Cheese Mosaic@gmail.com Plot No 10, 2nd Pasta Lane, Shahid Bhagat Singh Road, Colaba, Mumbai, India Navigation Links Home About Us Our cheese Contact us Navigation Links Privacy Policy Disclaimer Terms&Conditions Cookies Dear visitor! We use cookie technology on our website. We ensure that information collected through cookies will only be used in accordance with our privacy policy. Please note that disabling cookies may limit the functionality of our site. I agree What are cookies?

Crafted With Care Our cheese experts traverse the globe to handpick the finest cheeses, ensuring each selection meets our high standards of quality, authenticity, and ethical production. We celebrate the traditional methods that make each cheese unique, bringing the art of cheesemaking to your table. pages.privacy_policy_i_103: Cheese Mosaic - Privacy Policy Cheese Mosaic A Tapestry of Taste Home About Us Our cheese Contact us Cheese Mosaic Privacy Policy At Cheese Mosaic, protecting the privacy and security of our users' information is of utmost importance. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of information we collect, the purpose of the collection, and how we protect it. Information Collection To improve our services for all users, we collect various types of information, including: Contact Information: Such as name, email address, and phone number, provided during registration or inquiry. Browsing Data: Details of your visits to our site, including traffic and location data. Financial Transactions: Records of transactions made on our site, including purchases and payments. Use of Information The information we collect is used to: - Personalize your experience on our site. - Enhance the functionality and services offered through our website. - Efficiently manage transactions and orders. - Communicate with you regarding promotional activities, offers, and updates related to our products. Information Sharing We do not sell, trade, or share your personally identifiable information with external parties, except under the following conditions: - To comply with legal obligations. - To protect our rights or property. - To enforce our website policies. With contractors and service providers who assist in our business operations, under contractual obligations to keep the information confidential and use it solely for the purposes for which it was disclosed. Data Protection We use various security measures to protect your personal information. However, it is important to remember that no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is completely secure. Cookies Our website uses cookies to enhance user experience. You have the option to set your browser to reject cookies or to alert you when cookies are being sent. Policy Updates Cheese Mosaic reserves the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Changes will be posted on our website's main page. Inquiries For any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please feel free to contact us at privacy@cheesemosaic.com. pages.products_i_103: Cheese Mosaic: Indulge in India's Finest Curated Cheeses Cheese Mosaic A Tapestry of Taste Home About Us Our cheese Contact us Our Cheese Collection: A Tapestry of Elite Flavors ➛ Savor the Richness of India's Premium Cheese Selection Our Cheese: A Selection Reserved for the Connoisseur At Cheese Mosaic, every cheese is a masterpiece, waiting to be discovered. The Essence of Excellence Welcome to our collection at Cheese Mosaic, where the art of cheese reaches its pinnacle. Here, we offer an elite selection of the finest cheeses, each representing the zenith of flavor, texture, and quality. Our shelves are lined with rare finds and timeless classics, each with its own legacy and story. A Symphony of Flavors Paneer order It has a soft and delicate texture and is used in many dishes like shahi paneer, tandoori paneer and many more. Edam order It has a rich and creamy taste and characteristic aroma. Cheddar order It has a softer texture and a spicier flavor than traditional cheddar. Amul order It has a soft and creamy texture, and the flavor can be slightly sour and spicy. Kalari order It has a savory and creamy flavor and has tiny salt crystals that give it a unique texture. Appalakaya order It has a thin, light yellow skin and a creamy texture with a mild and creamy flavor. Halloumi order It is made from fresh milk and has a soft and delicate texture. Colby order It has a neutral flavor that pairs well with a variety of spices, making it a versatile ingredient for many dishes. Madaglak order It is made from cow's milk and has a light and slightly sweet consistency. Malaiengi order Cheese makers try to preserve the original and unique taste of cheese, which is the perfect combination of salt, sweetness and spiciness. Tilsit order Cheese has a rich and intense taste, which becomes more expressive with time of maturation. Brie order If you are looking for a cheese with an exotic taste, then Amuletti is exactly what you need. Camembert order Made from goat's milk, this cheese has a smooth texture and a sweet-slightly sour flavor. Manchego order This soft and delicate cheese is made from fresh milk and has a unique taste. Gruyere order It is often used in Kashmiri and Gujarati dishes, adding its characteristic aroma and piquancy. Emmental order 8This semi-hard cheese is made from cow's milk and has a slightly tangy and savory flavor. Chehul order This soft and delicate cheese with a delicious aroma is made from buffalo milk. Taleggio order This soft cheese with a smooth and creamy flavor is a popular delicacy in Indian cuisine. Indulge in our handpicked variety of elite cheeses: ➀ - The Aged Artisans: Discover the complex profiles of our aged cheeses, where time has woven its magic into every fiber, creating flavors that are both bold and nuanced. ➁ - The Creamy Delights: Embrace the lush, velvety textures of our soft cheeses, from the richest Bries to the most indulgent Camemberts, each one a creamy dream. ➂ - The Blue Mystique: Explore the intriguing world of blue cheeses, with their striking veins and robust flavors that command attention and awaken the palate. ➃ - The Local Legends: Taste the heritage of India with our selection of indigenous cheeses, which embody the vibrant spirit and diverse terroirs of our nation. ➄ - The Global Ambassadors: Take a sensory trip around the world with cheeses sourced from the finest international creameries, chosen for their unparalleled excellence and unique character. Craftsmanship and Quality Our commitment to quality means that we source our cheeses from only the most esteemed cheesemakers, those who marry traditional techniques with innovative methods to create products that are both authentic and groundbreaking. Pairing Perfection We don't just sell cheese; we offer a full sensory experience. Our experts are here to guide you on how to pair these exquisite cheeses with the perfect wine, fruit, or artisanal bread, elevating your cheese course to an act of celebration. Join the Mosaic Become a part of the mosaic that is our cheese legacy. Each piece in our collection is a tribute to the craft, waiting for you to uncover and enjoy. Whether for a special occasion or to savor the everyday, our elite cheeses are a testament to the heights that cheese can achieve. Experience Our Cheese We invite you to browse, to taste, and to fall in love with our selection. This is where the journey of taste transcends the ordinary and where every cheese tells its own exquisite story. ➛ back to the beginning Cheese Mosaic Contact Us +9102266333763 Cheese Mosaic@gmail.com Plot No 10, 2nd Pasta Lane, Shahid Bhagat Singh Road, Colaba, Mumbai, India Navigation Links Home About Us Our cheese Contact us Navigation Links Privacy Policy Disclaimer Terms&Conditions Cookies Dear visitor!
